text: وما يغنى عنه ماله اذا تردى

translations.translation: His wealth will not help him when he plummets to the depths.
And his riches will not avail him when he falls headlong (into the Abyss).
and his wealth shall be of no avail to him when he perishes.
and their wealth will be of no benefit to them when they face destruction.
His wealth will not avail him when he falls into ruin.
And what will his wealth avail him when he goes down (in destruction)
And his wealth will not avail him when he perishes.
his wealth shall not avail him when he perishes.
His riches will not save him when he perisheth.
nor will his wealth profit him when he falls [into the pit].
And his substance will avail him not when he perisheth.
His wealth will not avail him when he perishes.
Nor will his wealth profit him when he falls headlong (into the Pit).
And what will his wealth benefit him when he goes down (in destruction).
When he falls (into Hell), his wealth will not help him.
And his money will not avail him when he plummets.
And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?
[92:11] And his wealth shall not (mā is or negation) avail him when he perishes, in the Fire.
(His riches) which he amasses in the life of the world (will not save him when he perisheth) when he dies; and it is also said this means: when he is cast in the Fire.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَمَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُ مَالُهُ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰ } معناه إذا هَلَك وماتَ
 ويقال: إِذا تَردَّى في جَهنمَ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } بعدما نأخذه في النشأة الأخرى بسبب بخله وكفره { مَا يُغْنِي } يكف ويدفع { عَنْهُ مَالُهُ } شيئاً من غضب الله { إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰ } [الليل: 11] أي: هوى وهلك في قعر جهنم الإمكان وسعير النيران
